projects.title: Dance Salt Lake
projects.description: Bringing Salt Lake City's dance community together in one location.
projects.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to see all current and upcoming performances, auditions, classes, and available studio rentals in the greater Salt Lake City area. As a company, I want to be able to post, see, update, and delete specific events.

projects.title: React Robot
projects.description: Test your memory, save your score, and battle for the #1 spot.
projects.userStory: As a user, I want to play an increasingly challenging memory game. As a user, I want to be able to save my highscore and see other users' highscores.

projects.title: Rock Paper Scissors
projects.description: Two-player RPS game with a built in chat feature. Open up another tab in incognito mode to test the two player feature.
projects.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to play a game of rock paper scissors with another user, and be able to chat.

projects.title: Anime Finder
projects.description: Take the Anime Finder quiz to get paired with an anime genre based off a set of personality questions.
projects.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to take a quiz and be paired with an anime.
